content.text: Java How To Convert a String to an Array
Convert a String to an Array
There are many ways to convert a string to an array. The simplest way is to use the toCharArray() method:
content.html: There are many ways to convert a string to an array. The simplest way is to use the toCharArray() method:

content.code_html:
// Create a string
String myStr = "Hello";

// Convert the string to a char array
char[] myArray = myStr.toCharArray();

// Print the first element of the array
System.out.println(myArray[0]);

content.text: You can also loop through the array to print all array elements:
content.html: You can also loop through the array to print all array elements:

content.code_html:
// Create a string
String myStr = "Hello";

// Convert the string to a char array
char[] myArray = myStr.toCharArray();

// Print array elements
for (char i : myArray) {
  System.out.println(i);
}
